jobDescription: Develop and maintain cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter, IOS and Android. Design and implement modern, intuitive, and user-friendly UIs. Integrate RESTful APIs and other backend services. Debug, optimize, and enhance application performance. Assist in deploying mobile applications to the Google Play Store and Apple App Store. Work collaboratively with backend developers and product managers to deliver high-quality solutions. Stay updated on the latest trends and best practices in mobile app development.
